name: Gates of X
description:
CONTROLS:

Arrows / WASD move the character! [X] to let go of walls/ladders.

[X] or [SPACE] progress dialogue! (Yes, the choice of [X] is intentional!)

I'm sorry for any possible bugs! I tried to patch them all but things just kind of fell apart, lol. ><

Character Design & Dialogue: Side-of-Citrus!

Art + Scripting: Me!
